author: twp10
title: Perfect Stay
text: This is very much an overdue review from my trip in November. We celebrated my mother's birthday in Paris and couldn't have had a more perfect stay. Between the front desk, the concierge team, and the doormen, the staff were so welcoming and ensured a comfortable stay. A special thank you is due to Yaye at breakfast - her genuine warmth and sense of hospitality are assets to this hotel. The rooms are impeccably maintained, the location is fantastic, and the indoor swimming pool is unparalleled in Paris. This is certainly a top competitor among the Palace hotels of Paris.
